answerText: Journey to the West [or Xijouji][10] The Monkey King had previously angered his master Subhodi by transforming into one of these things. One of them is "uprooted" in the title of a Chikamatsu play about Azuma's love for Yojibei.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Delaware + Michigan A  | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This one of the Four Great Classic Novels of Chinese literature was written during the Ming Dynasty and is attributed to Wu Cheng'en. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, follows Xuanzang on a pilgrimage to India.
